card.subtitle: SRE/Linux System Administrator
card.text: Certified Linux SysAdmin, Certified Kubernetes Administrator, Automation, IaC, Cloud enthusiast

who.title: What I do?
who.text1: Certified Linux Administrator (LPIC-1) and Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) with a strong foundation in automation and Infrastructure as Code (Ansible, Shell, Python, and Terraform).
who.text2: Proficient in containerization technologies, including Kubernetes, VMware Tanzu, and Docker/Podman/Containerd.
who.text3: Currently focusing on expanding skills in Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) and DevOps within public cloud environments. Committed to collaborative problem-solving and driving excellence in the IT field.
who.text4: I also have experience as Web Developer.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.text5: Linux, Rhel, Ansible, Ansible Automation Platform, Terraform, Tomcat, Apache, Nginx, Mysql.
tech.text6: Kubernetes, VMware Tanzu, Docker, Podman, Containerd, Helm.
tech.text8: Git, Gitlab, pip, Hashicorp Vault, Grafana.
